page.title: 02Housing
page.content:
Bedgrove Houses. Some people like a detached house, With a double garage, And central-heating, You can have your own bedroom, And a bidet in the bathroom, And a great big garden to play in.
Some people like a semi, With a swing in the garden, And a sandpit to dig in, You can borrow next-door's lawnmower, And dance to their records, And listen when they have a row.
Some people like a flat, It's cosy and quiet, With a neat little kitchen, And a view across the country, And geraniums on the balcony, And stairs to run up and down.
